## Article Content

HOME
PACKAGES
Packages

Packages allow you to sell bundled services to your clients, usually at a discounted rate.

Track package sales: View details for each client, including usage history, remaining services, and service expiration dates.

Sell packages online: Sell packages in person and online through your website, online booking, or via direct purchase links.

Package agreements: Create agreements for each of your packages that clients must sign before purchasing online.

To enable the Packages app, go to Apps > Manage apps > Packages and select Enable.

To learn more about packages, watch our on-demand Packages video.

The articles in this section cover creating, selling, and managing packages.

In this section:
Creating a Package
Selling Packages in Person
Selling Packages Online
Using a Package During Checkout
Sell and Redeem a Package on the Same Day
Manually Adding Packages and Adjusting Package Quantities
Transferring a Package to Another Client
Can't find what you're looking for?
